#read and clean
co2df = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/temperature-and-co2/co2_data.csv')
sep = list(co2df.loc[4, :])
co2df.loc[:, :'Unnamed: 4'] = co2df.loc[:, :'Unnamed: 4'].shift(-5)
co2df.columns = list(sep)
for i in co2df.columns:
    co2df[i]= pd.to_numeric(co2df[i], errors='coerce')

#destroy corrupted values!!!
co2df.loc[co2df['Average'] < -90, 'Average'] = np.NaN
co2df = co2df.dropna(subset=['Average'])
